attributes.action: Coronavirus: Private sector providers must not be allowed to profit from the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Coronavirus is “the worst public health crisis for a generation”. There is an urgent need to better fund and equip the NHS and all its health care professionals to fight the spread of Coronavirus across the UK.
attributes.background: After 10 years of austerity cuts and outsourcing parts of the NHS the Government must now transfer profits from outsourced parts of the NHS and urgently re-direct those monies back into the NHS in order to fight the spread of Coronavirus.

rejection.details: We have accepted this petition calling for the Government to provide extra funding for the NHS to combat coronavirus, which you could sign if you wished: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302969.
